about_the_game:
Design and build your own Music festival!

Festival fever is a game about putting on the best and biggest music festival.

Design and build your festival from the ground up. Create stages, food stalls, and entertainment areas to cater to your punters' needs.

Curate an epic lineup by hiring bands from various genres. Balance the egos of rock legends with the demands of up-and-coming artists. Match the right acts to your audience’s preferences to keep the crowd energized and engaged throughout the festival.

Once you think you’re ready start letting the punters in and get that first band on stage!

But make sure you pay attention to your festival goers' feedback and needs. Keep them satisfied with a variety of food options, clean facilities, and plenty of entertainment. Happy punters mean more ticket sales and a growing reputation.

Progression and Rewards

As you successfully manage festivals, unlock new stages, bands, and special features. Earn rewards and achievements that showcase your festival planning prowess.

Step into the world of Festival Fever and experience the thrill of building and managing your own music festival. Can you rise to the challenge and create an unforgettable event that will be the talk of the town?
